modName: Alternative Play fewer God Reminders MOD REQUEST
summary: For those people who just want to play and not be reminded of gods so much
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION:
For those who want to just play the game to its depth and stay away from the god reminders because it bugs or annoys them.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WHAT THIS DOES:
Removes heimskr
Removes the markarth vigilant
Removes god Statues
Replaces the names of alters from gods to just gifts of
Removed Meridias beacon and just put dawnbreaker where the beacon used to go.
Renamed the amulets of the godsto just what they do.
Removed the statues from the loading screen.
Other things.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NO FIGHTING!:
Mod comments has been locked to prevent this, If you dont like this mod dont go to it i think ive been more then representable of what it is.
And also remember this was requested, And not to try to hold any disrespect against me or future mods i make, thankyou.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: thelawfull
